(Armor Piercing [armorpiercing], Affects Sacreds Only [sacredonly], Magic weapon [magic], Strength not added to damage [nostr])

Requires 5E to forge (E1)

The Black Halberd is made of high quality blacksteel and inscribed with the most sacred words. When the halberd is swung enemies of the faith are struck by exhaustion as the divine powers clash.
